alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 12 at 8:21PM MST until July 12 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 915 PM MST. * At 821 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Estrella Sailport to Olberg to 7 miles southeast of Bapchule to near Coolidge Airport, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 135 and 196. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 203. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 2. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Tolleson, Laveen, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Tempe Marketplace and South Phoenix. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
